author: Dave Lyon
comment: Seems to be an ok app. Ive tried to submit feedback to the dev's but cant as the app tells me to use a valid email? Anyway the app is ok, however id like the ability to toggle notifications. Id only like to see for my current location, but im bombarded with notification for any place ive added.

reply.author: Meteored
reply.content: Hi Dave. You can find this on the notification center section inside of settings. Here you are able to enable/disable notifications and choose what locations will be notified. Regards

author: Alf Onico
comment: Works with android 4.04. Good presentations of forecasts: the continuous graphical display in landscape mode is very well designed, clear, simple but with complete information. Needs the Google Play Services hog to display maps, but don't require it to display forecasts. Many settings are adjustable. ECMWF based Forecasts as good as others (southern France Mediterranean), and sometimes definitively better than ones based on GFS and WMF models. Data consumption reasonable. Data for the favorite locations is stored for future use (even without Internet connection). One negative point  (hence 4 stars instead of 5): only 10 locations stored (Winfinder, Windguru and Meteoconsult don't have this limitation). An other negative point, shared by several other weather applications, is the lack of date an time of the prediction (Winfinder and Windguru show the date and time of the weather model run, while Meteo Consult and many others don't show this info).

author: Greg Robb
comment: They invite you to include your city. Mine is Ningbo - one of China's most important cities. Having sent them your email numerous times, they do nothing about it. Lazy or what?!

author: David Sabbagh
comment: My favorite weather app was 1weather. Sadly 1weather has an issue now where the clock doesn't work so I was searching for a new weather with clock widget. This is the ONLY one I've found that has as much detail as 1weather, more in fact, and with a functional widget.

author: John Babes
comment: First impressions mean a lot when you open an app since I have had this for a few days now I have to say this a very well thought out weather app the ui is nice clear I also like the little animations sun or moon that move in and out nice idea could be better like the widget @4.2 on my home screen again nice and clear no real complaints well worth the asking price ...

author: Jason Kowkabzadeh
comment: It has incorrect information and is not great in certain countries, I was stood outside in the sunshine 15c and this stupid app said it was raining and 6 degrees so it's getting uninstalled

reply.author: Meteored
reply.content: Hello Jason. Could you tell us what are the locationes that you are checking? Thank you.

author: Matt Gomes
comment: Hidden weather app gem! I have installed dozens of weather apps, many of them paid for, but really like this one. Has everything I need in a easy to digest interface. Good widgets as well.
Best all-around weather app especially when planning in advance.

author: Peter Gallagher
comment: Besides being installed on my phone, I did so for my wife, and so have voice alerts on extreme weather conditions - better than Hi Google ;o)

author: Mark Weightman
comment: Leaving it as it does not fully support the UK user. Went to radar and the other view to be confronted by the US.

author: paul putnam
comment: I have this on 2 different android phones & it gives 2 slightly different readings for the same exact location. Shouldn't the forecast be the same for a location, no matter what phone the app is on?
Works really well for me.  I  like it.

author: Alan William Martin
comment: It was amazing until the latest update now widgets don't update. Have to keep clicking on it to update ....

author: Marco Void
comment: Really nice app!

author: Evangelos Bempelis
comment: Descent weather app, seems to be US-centric. When searching for location, "London" or even "London, United Kingdom" yields cities in the US.

author: Bill Weed
comment: Location is the most accurate one of all the weather apps I've used. The rest is as good as any other.

author: Richard Zucker
comment: nice colours, good app. would buy again 💪

author: Robert Pabijan
comment: If I could choose a weather provider,

reply.author: Meteored
reply.content: Hi Robert. We are our own weather provider based on the most accurate model at present. That's one point which made us exclusive. Have a nice day

author: Kevin Parker
comment: App works well

author: Darren Mcmullen
comment: Best weather app pin point accuracy.

author: David Lampard
comment: Can't fault it... Excellent.
Works good atm..

author: Gerald Shepherd
comment: It's good  :)

author: simon browse
comment: Awesome app

author: Joe Grandon
comment: Work good

author: Jameel Ahamed
comment: Good

author: Scott Benson
comment: Awesome

author: tim leath
comment: Terrible coverage of the eu/Europe in satellites and radar. Why,in a paid for app do we have to muck about liking,sharing etc to open up features ?

author: Bobby Olmsted
comment: I've been using this app for a while now it's preformed perfectly right out of the gate. With every update it's only gotten better, I've been using every Samsung device from a 5.0 operating 2.5 to the s7 edge operating 7.0 and everything in between its been one of my favorite weather apps but with that being said the most important thing is that it's reliable acurite and dependable. Don't hesitate try it and see its been well worth it

author: Andromeda Sirius
comment: I bought this app after using the free version  After couple months the predictions just failed completely  Now the temperatures not even close, weather warnings don't work even when there is a storm out there Please don't ruin this app Fix it asap! I will give back the 4 stars.

author: Justin Rhodes
comment: Ok app but very USA centric. Went to Japan and major city of Kyoto not available. To be really good must be comprehensive. Actual reports not bad but not always super accurate.

author: Nick Neill
comment: Generally good. Frustrating when it says a day will be dry and you get hours and hours of rain.

author: Robert Simon
comment: Have the app set to English, share on FB posts in German. Also about 2° to 3° difference between this app and others for my area. Overall ok app but I wouldn't buy it (even though I did) since there are better apps out there.

author: peter baigent
comment: Mediocre, nice widget. Got it when it was 10p. Been using it for months as it's better than the Samsung weather app

author: Sahil Sea
comment: This is a great app very beautiful user interface comes with a lot of features like radar at Google map contain no ads i love this app and it worth  5 🌟.

author: Raghavendra Ponuganti
comment: Not so great as expected before buying it. Weather results are also not accurate.

author: Edwin Warner
comment: Love the format and user interface, but it's extremely sad I can only save 10 locations. That really sucks a lot!

author: Magnus park
comment: This is one of the better weather apps, can't believe I didn't try it before. It's accurate including Waring's, I love the assortment of colours. Fantastic job Devs....

author: Maurice Wener
comment: Accurate, getting annoying now asking me for feedback and rate each time I open app  even though I have done this already
The free version is fantastic but I bought the full version to support the developers and to say thank you for the time and effort they have put into this amazing app.
